Zone file from issue #6.

>>> zone_in.txt
$TTL 3600        ; 1 hour
$ORIGIN exaple.com.
@       IN      SOA     ns.exaple.com. admin.exaple.com. (
                                2023031902      ; Serial
                                28800           ; Refresh
                                7200            ; Retry
                                604800          ; Expire
                                600             ; Minimum TTL
                        )

@       IN  A   1.1.1.1
; DNS Servers
                IN      NS      ns.exaple.com.
                IN      NS      ns2.exaple.com.
                IN      NS      ns3.exaple.com.

_acme-challenge IN   TXT  1iG9QDAgheMRmWz69jwupWG2QMbrubnNjZ47IrDb-40


<<< zone_out.txt
$ORIGIN exaple.com.
@ SOA ns.exaple.com. admin.exaple.com. 2023031902 28800 7200 604800 600
@ 3600 IN A 1.1.1.1
	 3600 IN NS ns
	 3600 IN NS ns2
	 3600 IN NS ns3
_acme-challenge 3600 IN TXT "1iG9QDAgheMRmWz69jwupWG2QMbrubnNjZ47IrDb-40"
